name: Split Second
summary:
Step into the Shadows! Clear the Unknown!
Immerse yourself in the boots of a SWAT officer tasked with clearing hostile environments where tension hangs as heavy as the silence. This VR tactical shooter plunges you into tight, atmospheric interiors where every room tells a story—and hides a threat.

Sweep rooms with precision, breach doors, detain suspects, and face unnerving encounters in dimly lit corridors. Your training, instincts, and trigger discipline are your only allies in this eerie,...
